data.title: Apartments Auburn Hills
data.meta_description: Moceri Companies offers premium 1, 2, and 3-bedroom apartment residences and luxury rental townhomes in the heart of Auburn Hills.
data.text:
Luxury for Rent Townhomes & Apartments in the Heart of Auburn Hills!

As you step into one of our Auburn Hills apartments or townhomes for rent, you may never experience luxury the same way again. Every corner of our Parkways of Auburn Hills community features elegant interiors with a sophisticated style. Every detail is paramount as we build every aspect of the community, from creative interior design to tasteful landscaping throughout. In addition, Parkways offers our residents a variety of amenities in the area in addition to the accommodations offered in our apartments and townhomes.

In fact, award-winning restaurants and first-class shopping, like Somerset Mall, Great Lakes Crossing, and The Village of Rochester, are all within proximity of these luxury apartments for rent. Meadowbrook Amphitheatre, DTE Energy Music Hall, and movie theaters are among the social attractions, as are outstanding colleges and universities and leisure opportunities. Our community is conveniently situated near many local parks and trails. The Clinton River Trail, for example, runs directly behind the property and spans 16 miles across five cities. Parks and recreation are abundant in this area, including the Avondale Park of Rochester Hills, the Stage Nature Center, and Innovation Hills, to name a few. With our new luxury home rentals from Moceri, you will find only the finest amenities and activities near you, especially being moments away from the M-59 expressway.

APPLY NOW
